channel.title: Helicopter encounter broken?
channel.description:
When I first got the Rocket Launcher, I had a hell of a time shooting down the helicopter that appears right afterwards. Several times I shot all of my rockets (about 8 or so) at it, AND used the Tau laser, and it refused to die.
On the final try, I ended up hiding in the rocket launcher room, and when I poked my head back outside, the helicopter was facing to the side, shooting off into the distance. I proceeded to unload everything I had (rockets and lasers), only to cause the copter to start smoking and spinning in place. I wandered around for a while after that, and eventually found one last rocket I had missed, and FINALLY this one initiated the scripted crash.
Sorry I don't have screenshots, but I didn't think of taking any at the time, and have no idea what caused it to turn sideways, as it only did that once.

item.title: Helicopter encounter broken?
item.dc:creator: unix87
item.description:
Are you playing on hard difficulty? I played on normal and it took about 8 hits with rockets to take it down. When I finally did it (after like 5 tries), I noticed that there is a box nearby (where you got the launcher) with infinite rocket launcher ammo. You can use it with the E key, just like in Half-Life 2.

I also noticed that when NPC’s do some of their scripted sequences, it is impossible to do damage to them, but I doubt that this applies to the helicopter at that point.
